meanings.definition: The starting point or beginning of something.
meanings.sent1: The inceptions of the project were filled with excitement and anticipation.
meanings.sent2: Her inceptions into the world of painting began at a young age.
meanings.sent3: The inceptions of the party planning committee led to some unexpected challenges.
meanings.sent4: The inceptions of a friendship can sometimes be as fragile as a delicate flower.
meanings.sent5: The inceptions of a new idea can spark creativity and innovation.

meanings.sent1: The team celebrated the successful inceptions of their new marketing campaign.
meanings.sent2: His inceptions always involved careful planning and attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The inceptions of the race were delayed due to unexpected weather conditions.
meanings.sent4: The inceptions of a journey can be both thrilling and nerve-wracking.
meanings.sent5: The inceptions of a new business venture require dedication and perseverance.
